website_summaries.verdict: This durable plastic kitchen from trusted brand Little Tikes is a good, compact size and includes lots of extra features for a decent price.
pros: With its corner-style design, the Little Tikes Super Kitchen doesn't take up a lot of space and is great for a child's bedroom
It includes a phone, so your little one can invite their dolls over for dinner
Also makes noises and lights up
cons: Some users have reported that the doors don't always fit properly

customer_reviews.title: Little Tikes really dropped the ball with this one! 🙁
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I love Little Tikes, and their kitchens in particular. This one is not one of them. I am not sure what happened here but this is a drastic departure from their normal quality standard. Most of the parts fit together badly if they fit at all. It looks mostly ok when you get it totally put together but there is no way it will last 3 months of continuous play. So very disappointed. Bonus they included every language instruction but English. At least that was not the worst bit for those of us who have done this before. 😱
customer_reviews.author: Derec and Eva Blackstone

customer_reviews.title: Pre-damaged product
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in an unmarked cardboard box and was damaged in several places. The "oven" door didn't open or close properly, and there was a portion of the counter that had been damaged in such a way that it left a very sharp edge of plastic on one side that would definitely have been dangerous for a little child. It seemed pretty clear to me that the product was damaged before it was sent because the box did not show any signs of having been dropped or hit. The return procedure was followed and I received a refund, but it was a huge waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Super Chef
customer_reviews.text: We appreciate the shipper taking the time to wrap the box in plastic. This really helped since the box is just paper. Parts to assemble not maked at all on the packaging making you compare the instructions to the actual parts. Feet especially hard to get on the bottom of the toy even with liquid soap as a lubricant. (Not kidding , it's in the instructions). Overall I am rating this toy a 3 for assembly issues and priced a bit too high.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Little Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little kitchen for those low on space. The price was great and I really liked the fact it is angled a bit; does not take up as much room because of that. The assembly was fairly easy. I was able to do myself. I am better with worded instructions than pictures except I did manage to get this together within a few minutes. I was impressed with the screws, this thing is really held together tight and sturdy. The little cabinets are nice. They are not very spacious except they do the trick. My kid loves his kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: KELLY B

customer_reviews.title: when did they start sending instructions in just badly printed pictures?!
customer_reviews.text: First off, the instructions were horrible. Have people forgotten how to read? Is that the reason for the pictures? PLEASE use your words..(usually I only have to tell my child that.. didn't think I'd need to tell a company..) The legs? don't use them, it's a trap and will fall forward after insertion and I was unable to get them back out of the toy. A busted lip was not wanted in yule photos, but hey-- "tis the season." The plates do not fit in the cubby, they will just roll away. And two out of the......four doors will not remain closed. oh, yeah.. PARENTS: this does NOT come with pre-drilled holes. BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: Salem

customer_reviews.title: ... stars because my daughter is over the moon in love with it
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars because my daughter is over the moon in love with it. The little feet were a bit of a challenge to get in and we had to shave a little bit of the plastic out to get one of them in. It seems to lean forward so the dishes won't stay in place and the white cabinet door comes open. Will probably just put some velcro on the door. For the price it didn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Lel

customer_reviews.title: Door didn't open properly
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my preschool and when I received it the door on the left wouldn't open more then a few inches. So I returned it and ordered another one the next day. When I received it I tried the door and it had the same problem that the first one had. I am returning that one as well and will not buy another. I didn't assemble it because I checked the doors before starting to assemble it so I can't say how easy or hard the assembly of it was.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: fantastic!!!!
customer_reviews.text: great for the price compared to other kitchens. stove has a button that bubbles like boiling pot and also sizzling like a fryingn pan. she played with it for like 3 hours straight. bought play food from amazon and she kept filling the oven, fridge, microwave and cabinet and dishholder. looks real and works like real.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: On top of a major missing piece it looks like it was rolled around in a dirt pile
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this negative stars!! The whole freaking countertop is MISSING!!! Thanks little tikes for destroying christmas for my child, the one thing he asked Santa to bring him and he's not going to get it... I am one pissed off momma!!! On top of a major missing piece it looks like it was rolled around in a dirt pile and has major scrapes, I would not recommend anyone getting this for their kid
customer_reviews.author: Howard Brinson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy customers
customer_reviews.text: I loved how it came fast and in a box without pictures!!!!!! I tried buying a little better quality than the last kitchen we had. I tried looking at the pictures and read reviews. My daughter loves the kitchen even though the doors on the bottom are not very secure and even. I would have liked the bottom of the counter to curve in or @ not have been so thin. It is a perfect size for my tall 3 year old and her cousins who are 3 and almost 2. My daughter plays with this all the time. Because it is small, my husband doesn't complain about it being in our main living areas.
customer_reviews.author: Snelsonclan

customer_reviews.title: What's cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Worst possible design and construction of the legs for this unit one can do. However, we notified the company and they immediately sent replacements. A Plus Plus on customer service. Replacement feet did not work either but because of the customer service we kept the unit and the little one is enjoying her birthday present. We just pulled all the legs off.
customer_reviews.author: GJC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compact kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our granddaughter to have a play kitchen when she comes to our house. I wanted something small to push into the corner of the room when she isn't here. I also wanted something sort of unisex. This is a great little kitchen. She is 1, so she won't outgrow it too soon. Comes with great little accessories so no need to buy more plates, cups, utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size Stove
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I was a little worried that I would struggle with putting it together. I had no trouble at all tho. A lot said that the legs were hard to get on, but all I had to do was push a corner in & they seemed to screw right in with no problem. I got it put together in about 45 minutes including putting the stickers on. It was a great height & sturdy. I think it will be played with for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Keegan Shea

customer_reviews.title: A lot of Parts missing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product as my granddaughters christmas present knowing that it would arrive a few days later. I printed and image and told her this was coming in the mail. She was so excited. We received this product today and upon opening the box we noticed parts were missing. There were no screws, no stickers, no coffee pot, no pan, no plates, no phone and no faucet. This is completely unacceptable she was heart broken when we told her we were gonna have to send it back. I would not recommend buying this product to anybody. It was like a teaser to my granddaughter. Definitely would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gina and Joe Anaya

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute but does have some issues.
customer_reviews.text: When I received it, it was damaged. Worked with amazon customer service and got a partial refund for it. The feet didn’t go on well or at all so my husband and I just said “screw it” and didn’t add them. The cabinet door “handle” didn’t stay on and I don’t know where my kids put it. The knob for the stove was broken so I glued that permanently on for them. The stickers were the easiert thing to put on. It is cute but it does have some issues.
customer_reviews.author: H H

customer_reviews.title: The boys loved it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a Christmas present for our two-and-a-half year old grandson. Far and away it was the hit of the family Christmas party with all the boys. These little boys are all fanatic outdoor jocks, each of whom is all boy. Our son had to get one for his boys. It has a control that makes the sound of sizzling bacon and running water. The knobs turn and/or click. The doors open and the included accessories are great. It does require significant assembly including application of decals on the windows of the oven/microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: The children love this kitchen. It was not as easy to put together as I thought it would be. The legs wouldn't go into holes and when we tried some of them bent. Soap didn't work. We had to make the holes a bit bigger to get the legs in. On of the cupboard doors was hard to attach as the hole was not quite in the correct spot. I love Little Tikes, but have found that with everything big, the toys don't always go together as directions say.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Munsey

customer_reviews.title: Needlessly difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I neglected to heed the advice of other reviewers stating how difficult this is to assemble. We still can not attach the microwave or cabinet door. Little Tikes used to be my “go to”, first choice company when buying toys, both large and small, for my children. That was 30+ years ago. This purchase was made for my grandchildren to play with at my house. Unfortunately, companies change. It would have been so easy for Little Tikes to drill holes to make the door attachment easier. We will have to wait until we can borrow a drill that can bore through hard plastic - and hope we hang them evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine L. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit squarely in corner
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit neatly into a corner (not 45 degree angle). It's mildly annoying. If it's not meant to go in a corner, it could be rectangular. The triangular shape makes all the compartments an odd shape, so things don't fit well inside.
customer_reviews.author: audreylorraine

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: I remember having a Little Tikes kitchen set as a kid. It was awesome! This thing sucks. It's not sturdy at all. The plastic is flimsy. The faucet doesn't function. The handles to all the cabinets & doors are just holes in the plastic. I'm very upset to have wasted money on this & sorry that my kids will no longer get to grow up with Little Tikes toys. Save your hard earned time & money. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the little tikes super chef kitchen for my son got Christmas. As my husband and I took it out of the box to assemble it on Christmas Eve - we were so disappointed by the quality. There is at least a centimeter deep and 2-3 centimeter long gash in the side of the plastic. Sure looks like this thing has been through the ringer even though it is in its original package. Unfortunately, we didn't take it out of the box until the day before we need to give it to our child. We have several other little tikes toys that we have had no problems with, so we are discouraged by the poor quality of this kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna N.

customer_reviews.title: the set up is not fun. The noise maker just screws in and doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a pain to put together. The doors fit too tight, the screws are about an inch longer than they need to be, the set up is not fun. The noise maker just screws in and doesn't even blend in with the oven top. My child who LOVES play kitchens, will play with this for all of 2 minutes before just walking off to play with the plastic plates or pizza pieces it came with. I really wish I would have opted for another play kitchen. Maybe even a different model of Little Tikes. I always buy Little Tikes items, and this is the first that I have to say... I hate. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gage

customer_reviews.title: Promotes endless play time
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas gift for my four year old daughter. She loves it! It was easy to assembly, with clear directions. My only complaint is that we could not get the pegs in the bottom for the feet. It is okay to use without them, it will sit flat on the floor and the base is sturdy enough that we had no issues just leaving them off. It promotes endless pretend play and the kids love it! Little tykes is by far one of my favorite brands for kids toys.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: This child loooooooved this gift. He said oooooooh and clapped his little hands then played with it for 2 hours straight. Love that it is not some hideous neon pink and purple with glitter. Nice colors you don't mind having in your house. My husband assembled. He's mechanically inclined so it wasn't too bad and would've been better if he had followed directions and used soap before he destroyed a foot. And put the sticker for the oven on before you put on the knob.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernJill

customer_reviews.title: 2 1/2 year old digs it!
customer_reviews.text: Came shipped in original manufacturers box with no other outside box as protection. Box a little beat up. Contents seemed okay upon opening. Three big plastic pieces followed by other smaller packaged pieces (plates, cups, accessories, screws, etc.) to complete the ensemble. Easy to put together. Directions straight forward but pay attention to sticker instructions prior to putting on other pieces. Stickers are very sticky and require perfect placement. Fun little kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: He loved it and has been playing with it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my nephew as a Christmas gift. He loved it and has been playing with it a lot. Assembly wasn't too bad, and some of the pieces were already put together. Once you stick on the stickers, they don't come off, which is good for when the kids play with it, but bad if you accidentally put it on crooked. It came with some accessories to play with like a coffee pot, silverware, two plates, two cups and a phone, but it would be nice if it came with a few more things, or some play foods! Overall great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, hard to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I use this toy in a pre-school Sunday school setting where we set up church every Sunday in a public high school. The kitchen is standing up to the multiple moves and storage on a truck during the week. The children love the toy. They can stand up and use it. It was hard to assemble, had my husband do it. It took him a couple of hours. The legs don't stay on but that is ok, they are not needed.
customer_reviews.author: Barry A Bender

customer_reviews.title: Coffee pot n legs most complaints ”easy fix”
customer_reviews.text: Many was saying how the coffee pot was fully sealed. I drill a hole into the top and the spout, Washed really well n now it’s a fully useable to put water in n serve in cups. Next legs are very hard to insert. So I made a “v” shape notch in the blue plastic where the holes are to get legs in easier then I used a liquid nail adhesive to glue in place. Makes it much more sturdy
customer_reviews.author: brenda boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: just better from little tikes
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable pain to put together. Just the work and stress involved in putting it together should make the price drop at least $20. The bottom "screw in"feet do not screw in and if you push too hard they squish up. The decal stickers have to be put on just right or they bubble and you cannot get them off and fix them. The directions had me putting on the fridge door and the oven door but only those two were already put I and they were put on wrong. I expected more...or easier...just better from little tikes.
customer_reviews.author: Lkag

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this since its a simple and light design. My daughter got very excited when it arrived but we were disappointed to see several damaged parts. One of the door was broken, the base was bent and overall it looked like used. Two of the doors that were not supposed to be installed were already installed which made me think it was not new.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Almost Impossible to Assemble- Cannot recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our grandchildren to use when they visit. The unit requires a lot of difficult assembly. Certain pieces (e.g. the legs) cannot be properly inserted without bending the plastic out of shape. We ended up using the toy without the legs as they kept falling out. Overall, poorly designed and very frustrating to put together. Look for another product.
customer_reviews.author: FG

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 1.5 year old niece for Christmas, she loves it! Wish it came with food, too, but I got her a set to play with. She makes her mama coffee every day lol. Was easy to put together, took less than half an hour, sturdy, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa T.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and he loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson who loves playing with a similar one at my other daughters house. It was perfect for a little boy. I got extra pots and food. He loves that it makes sounds. It was perfect for a 5 yr old and doesn’t take up his whole room.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it on Christmas Day!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Husband assembled easily but with some tools. Does not take up a ton of room in our tiny basement. Loved everything it came with. The kiddos love playing with it and it has two distinct areas so they aren't fighting when they play.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey S

customer_reviews.title: Cute Little Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Cute little thing for the toddler to mess around with. A few more little turnable nobs and stuff would make it better. lightweight and pretty simple instructions and assembly. Packaging was a surprise as it was a box taped around the unassembled product, but wasn't expecting much for a big piece of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: 808Surfrider

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves our kitchen so we decided to get this product. He loves his little own kitchen. Loves turning the knobs. Opening and closing the doors. It’s sturdy enough for him to enjoy and bang away with his pots and pans. He is a two year old. Loves serving us coffee.
customer_reviews.author: hedhunter34

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for (sale $70)
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price compared to other options considering most kids won't use it that long. It took no time at all to put it together very easy. Good for people with limited space. Thankfully after reading other reviews and seeing so many missing pieces we did not have that problem. However all the reviews about the door not working are true. Its not trimmed enough so the door scrapes the kitchen. To make it work you need to file the plastic so that the door can open more than a few inches. Other than that for a kids kitchen it's fairly underwhelming but not a bad choice.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Durable and space saving design
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great little kitchen. It has a gender neutral design and comes with plenty of accessories. I like that it's designed to sit in a corner so it doesn't take up too much room. We have six kids, and host a lot of play dates; it looks brand new despite daily use. I was a little leery of the assembly process after reading other reviews, but it was not a problem at all. My husband had it together in about half an hour, and it would've been quicker than that without our daughters "helping him".
customer_reviews.author: busymomof6

customer_reviews.title: it is a great little compact kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Fits the space we wanted it for perfectly, but the manufacturing and subsequent assembly leaves something to be desired. The feet were so difficult to put on we only successfully got two of the six. Finally wet decided we'd forgo the feet and I had to destroy the two we'd gotten on to remove them. Their solution to lazy manufacturing was to us to use soap/lubricant to slide the feet on, but they were so weak/hollow that we were still crushing them trying to get them on. Other than all the assembly frustrations, it is a great little compact kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin W. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Initially bought this for my Granddaughter, who just loves it, she just turned three. The new one year old Grandson loves it as well. Looks like it will stay here vs. following them home, which was the initial plan over a year ago. Looks great & gives them both hours of enjoyment all of the time. A nice quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Poses a hazard: unstable, tips over
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandchild because we liked the compact design. However, once assembled, the two lower doors do not work well. They stick and do not open smoothly and when the child tries to open the door past that sticking point, the whole kitchen tips and poses a real hazard. There is no way to remedy the door problem. We did take off the four legs so that the unit now sits directly on the floor and has a more stable base. Sloppy workmanship. Where is the quality control? Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CCjan

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly of this product was, at best, a disaster. The pieces didn't fit together properly and support was non-existent. After more hours than I want to count, decided it wasn't worth it. I tried to return it, but Amazon wanted me to disassemble it and ship it back. I had already discarded the box, so that wasn't an option. Now I'm stuck with the Titanic of kiddie kitchens, and my daughter can't play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel L

customer_reviews.title: Toddlers love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this kitchen. It has some cool extra features I haven't seen on other sets like the button that makes cooking and boiling sounds and the removable phone. It was easy to put together. I did it alone in about 1/2 hour. I didn't put the feet on and it's plenty stable without them.
customer_reviews.author: Bacasmommie

customer_reviews.title: Go to Target or Walmart!
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment!!!! I ordered this last month for my sons birthday and we just opened it tonight.....terrible!!! We got no directions, no stickers, the oven door wont stay shut and the kitchen has scratches and cuts all over the plastic itself....perhaps this is from being shoved in a box that was damaged to hell. Such a disapointment...should have gone to walmart!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: 5 STAR purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughters and grandsons since this is a gender neutral color. It was easy to assemble. The only drawbacks are the bottom legs were difficult to put on and the 2 plates that come with the kitchen don't stay in the slots too well. The 4 3/4" white plate which comes with the set fits in the oven easily. I even tested a 5 1/2" plate in the oven. Yes, the cabinet, microwave, refrigerator & oven are small in size but this is still a nice kitchen play set for the money. Overall, I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: frankland

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Kitchen...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this. It's a little hard to put together only because not all the holes line up or even exist. Some are a little hard to get tightened, I even broke one of the plastic components connecting the top to the base because you couldn’t see/tell when it was tight. But it all worked out and is holding up well. It has it all, microwave, oven, cupboard, fridge and it even has the “ice maker/water” cutout in the door. Too fun sharing a playtime meal with her. Looks very nice in the room too.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaH

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect start up kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect start up kitchen, My son was so excited that he was starting to play with it even though I was still putting them together. I wasn't able to put the feet, but the rest is so easy to put together. It provided my son hours and hours of fun and pretend play . It came with pizza toy food.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: Nice, compact kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Nice, compact kitchen, that isn't pink. I don't think kitchens should be so feminine. I bought mine for my son and he loves it. And it didn't offend his father since it was not "girly." the only problem is a common problem with plastic toys from little tikes--trying to put it together. You are screwing metal screws into plastic that doesn't always line up well. It went together with minimal curses. This was the kitchen with the best price, best appearance, and minimal space requirements. And, the child loves it. A win.
customer_reviews.author: AFMommafulltimestudent

customer_reviews.title: Affordable & Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Purchase for our 18 month old to grow into. Love it. Super easy assembly (maybe 45 min, with wine), and fits great in the small space we had available for it. Occupied the baby’s attention almost the entire Christmas Day. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: mamaclaire

customer_reviews.title: My toddlers love this!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughters (almost 3 and almost 2) for Christmas. They love it! We haven't put batteries in it yet, so I don't know how that works, but it's loads of fun for them even without the extra noises. The legs are tricky to put on (at least on ours). We decided to just leave them off. Everything else looks/works great. Excellent colors, space-saving size, and just plain fun!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: You’ll get a USED/pre-open one
customer_reviews.text: Well, I got one that was previously built. You can tell there were areas where someone tried to drill a hole. I thought a handle was missing but it’s was inside one of the kitchen pieces. I’m giving it 3 starts because of it being used. The box it came in was a plain box with no branding. Just posting here to let other parents know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little kitchen! Sits nicely in a corner and doesn't take up too much room in our playroom. Our nearly two and four year olds (girl and boy) both love it! It was not hard to put together. It had all the pieces and nothing was difficult to assemble. The hardest part was the stickers. Those suckers will NOT come up after touching the plastic, so make sure you line it up first. I've got one with a big crease and bubble. Drives me nuts, but the kids don't mind. My kids have great imaginations, so it doesn't matter that they're aren't more knobs and such. I actually prefer it that way. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: K. Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Item as described. Some parts difficult to put on.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas. Item just as discribed. Only negative is the legs that are supposed to go on are really hard to get on and almost all of them bent when I tried. We ended up having to throw them out and are using the kitchen set without the legs. One of the reasons why I purchased this set is because Iike how it looked. Doesn’t look the same without the legs so kind of disappointed. Wish they were easier to put on and they were better made. If you don’t care about the legs it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Shipped in mildewed box.
customer_reviews.text: The item was shipped within two boxes. The inside box and the tape used to seal it was covered with mildew/mold. I cannot imagine how the shipper could have not seen it. I tried to wipe the item off with an antibacterial wipe but there is black on the plastic that won't wipe off. I am afraid keeping it might create a health hazard for my granddaughter. I have a picture but I'm not tech savvy enough to add it.
customer_reviews.author: V. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Nice little play kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to put together, but my kids (3+5 yrs) are enjoying it. Seems to be holding up well (after a month of use) to the kids using it daily. Not as colorful as some other play kitchens, but very reasonable price, and I like the sound feature. Many hours of fun for kids who like to pretend to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hamel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my niece’s playhouse. Mine didn’t even come with the little legs that everyone is complaining about. Super easy to put together, except for the stove knob. I almost chucked it and said forget about it. Luckily I finally got it in.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Was a hit with the grands
customer_reviews.text: They like making fake food. They also use their "real" foo sometimes (which is quite messy). WE got accessory plastic food and utensils. They play restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: MLBNFP

customer_reviews.title: Versatile well used toy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a toy that my kids use in phases but it is reasonably sturdy and fairly easy to put together and has many items for imaginative play. I put it together myself on the night before Christmas and it took at hour or a little more. I used a drill screw driver but don't know if that would have been absolutely necessary or not. Biggest down side is that it has fallen over a couple times and even though it is light, it causes tears. I believe it came with a wall strap so I should install that but it takes up enough room that I don't want to be commited to one location in the house.
customer_reviews.author: LVATTY

customer_reviews.title: Missing alot of parts and dishes
customer_reviews.text: I would have left a good review but I am missing parts, all the dishes. I was going to give this to my kids for her bday . But it is a nice size for a 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: Little kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Great little kitchen. I bought it for a home daycare so for the price it will be a good buy but I will keep it in the budget to purchase another because this might not last a really long time.
customer_reviews.author: Shon S.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey for the product received
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my daughter for Christmas she loves it. It came with some cosmetic issues. A deep scratch on the base of it. 2 of the legs were stripped I had to shave the holes to put it together. Lots of parts to screw and snap together. Came in a plain box rather than an original package. She is happy with it though but not sure it's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and gagets!
customer_reviews.text: Finally opened this to put together, small area of torn plastic on the bottom - no biggie could have occurred in mailing but we had to "file" it, missing the fridge picture, missing a knob and no coffee pot or phone were included. Regardless, my niece loved it. I live it CT and had it mailed to CA and should have had them check all the parts but that should be part of the quality check. We did not want to open the box prior because if sealed, it was hidden. It is very cute thought but a little top heavy/wobbly so we secured it to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for a little girl.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful toy for 5 year old girl. She was on an angel tree for Christmas and specifically requested this toy. The seller RockSab went out of his way to get it to us in time so our Christmas tree angel could have it for her Christmas morning
customer_reviews.author: Jim walker

customer_reviews.title: The sides have markings all over it and I am stuck since I will not be able to receive a new one by tomorrow for Christmas morni
customer_reviews.text: I received this Kitchen set and it came damaged. I just opened the box to put it together for my son for Christmas tomorrow and the door does not fully open or close. The door came attached which the directions stated instructions on how to assemble it - leading me to believe it was already returned for the same reason. The sides have markings all over it and I am stuck since I will not be able to receive a new one by tomorrow for Christmas morning so I am very disappointed by the quality and care/shipping of this product!!!! Over all this set is very flimsy and description is misleading - I would not recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: My Twins LOVE this!!
customer_reviews.text: Big enough my two 2.5yo have no problem sharing space, but also compact enough not to be a pain in the butt. Highly recommend. Putting it together was a 30 minute process. Stickers were a pain but that was about all. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J Maynard/Erika Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The kids absolutely loved it! Assembly not bad, but the stickers were horrible. One try and if you don’t get it right, they are ripping! The small legs on the bottom don’t hold in well and kept falling out, but over all of the kids are happy that’s all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: No problem putting it together. Grandson loves it. Compact and doesn’t take up too much space! Good value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not everything there
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter's first birthday. While it is super cute it was supposed to come with dishes, a pan, and silverware. It did not come with any of that. And it came with a pizza pan, a pizza cutter, a pizza none of which it was supposed to come with. Edit: I forgot to add it was also missing the faucet spout. :(
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter seems to like it.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t expect it to come lose in the box, I thought for a moment that it was a used item. Put together rather swiftly. I didn’t add the stickers as it was a Christmas gift for my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Evonne

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen set!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love their kitchen set! It is very durable and colorful. The girls enjoy playing with it on a daily basis. I’m glad I purchased it for them.
customer_reviews.author: Sheilah The Great!

customer_reviews.title: Accessories are Awesome!  Nice Size!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas Present for my grandson! He loves it! It has many more accessories than the other kitchens. I was surprised by the quality. This will be around for my future grandkids. The size is very nice - not too big. It fits nicely in his room. NOW FOR THE HARD PART - putting it together took me over an hour so don't wait until the last minute. I am not handy but I got it done, the instructions were clear. Putting the stickers on was the hardest part but when I was done I felt pretty good about how they looked!
customer_reviews.author: Gina and Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t what I expected
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! The kitchen “feet” are impossible to install without damaging/bending plastic parts. I just gave up and left them off... honestly not necessary anyway! Needs bigger storage cabinets... oddly shaped.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Kid tested and approved, mom likes this smaller version of a play kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old son for Christmas and he was (and is) elated. It was simple to put together, nothing complicated to it. It fits nicely in the corner of our playroom. He opens and closes all the doors (not gently) and slams his play food and play dishes around in and on this play kitchen and it doesn't show a mark. I would recommend to anyone who wants to have a play kitchen, but not one of the ginormous ones that takes up 5 feet of wall space. He LOVES LOVES LOVES the sound effects that the coffee pot and burner make. He makes us all coffee daily.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Got this kitchen for my son, the kitchen was missing a bag of parts including the stove top knob, and the coffee part among various other parts.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great play set and my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great play set and my daughter loves it. My only complaint is that the oven and fridge parts are extremely narrow, the pan the set comes with barely fits in it, and other pieces from other cooking play sets definitely won't fit in there. Other than that, amazing, and my daughter truly loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny BothersTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Great little nook piece for visiting with grandparents
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter. Very sturdy but hard to get the bottom leg piece in so I left them off. She loves it and it small enough to fit in tight spaces but fun enough to keep her occupied.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn H

customer_reviews.title: Engaged
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for kids. And the quality is good as well. We missed some parts when assembling it. And it did not take more than 15mins for hubby to get it together. Other than the parts that was not included in the box,its a great product for the price,and it keeps my girls busy
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen once you get it put together!
customer_reviews.text: Great play kitchen. Perfect for a 4year old.. The assembly directions were a challenge and some pieces were a tough fit. But after assembly was complete it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: OMPHOTO.NET

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy product. Appropriate for ages 3 to five, I would say, due to the size. My grandson loves it and plays with it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Pierce

customer_reviews.title: it is nice and my granddaughter likes to play with it
customer_reviews.text: it is nice and my granddaughter likes to play with it. Since it is made of molded plastic you have no adjustment area to make sure pieces fix exactly the way they are supposed to, the white cabinet door is made a bit smaller than the opening so the door doesn't stay closed. Plus be very careful with the stickers they have no error or realignment glue applied, so you have no room for mistakes.
customer_reviews.author: Romancegal

customer_reviews.title: Kids like it, but...
customer_reviews.text: It looks cool, doesn’t take up a lot of space and the kids like it, but one the “cabinet” door nor oven door will stay shut.
customer_reviews.author: Brad M

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine
customer_reviews.text: This was cheaply made. Some of the material at the openings were not smoothed out. However, my daughter loves it so it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tausha Allen

customer_reviews.title: That stupid towel bar was impossible
customer_reviews.text: The thing was monstrous to put together. That stupid towel bar was impossible. My husband struggled to get the feet on. The cabinet door gets stuck. It's nice and compact so it saves space, but that's hardly worth the aggravation of putting the damn thing together.
customer_reviews.author: M. Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Needs better customer hints and instructions
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are lacking.....would have been nice to have a helpful hint about the soap reference and extra leg help since it obviously has caused many people problems. Once together without legs....my granddaughter had no issues and enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Poor assembly design
customer_reviews.text: Look else where. Parts do not fit as described (especially the feet) and no labeling. Maybe if it holds up once it’s together it may be fun but spend your money on something else.
customer_reviews.author: D&R

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price and space
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my Grandson of 8 for Christmas that loves to cook. Great price too I looked everywhere and this was the best for price and space and very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today - not in a box from the manufacturer but a brown box inside another brown box - like it had been opened and then returned. It is cracked and broken and I would like a NEW replacement ASAP - it was purchased for a pre-school and the kids all knew it was arriving today and were excited to play with it tomorrow
customer_reviews.author: pac

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Kitchen was a Christmas gift. Opened it up Christmas morning and it was missing all if the dishes/kitchen ware and phone. It was also missing the faucet, stove burner and the towel rack bar. It came with an extra coffee pot and 2 extra sets of legs for the bottom. The kitchen itself is good plastic but the doors are very cheap and flimsy. Only real pro was its compact but doesn't seem overly small
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Klerk

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my daughter and she loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter and she loves it! It's not very big so it doesn't take up a lot of space, but it's just enough for the little one to play with
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughters birthday (2&3) and they were so happy until started to put together. Missing handles to doors, sound device, and legs for base. Needless to say very unhappy girls and grandma. Amazon wants it sent back, but the kids had already played in box waiting and not happy at having to dismantle the kitchen. Try to explain to the little girls. Not pleased with Amazon, hope to have better luck with the company of stove. Kat Anderson
customer_reviews.author: K. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice kitchen shame about the set-up instructions
customer_reviews.text: Baby just LOVES this. We spent all afternoon playing in her kitchen. Would have given 5 stars but the set-up was HORRIBLE. If I hadn't had a handyman it would have been returned. He had to drill holes where they FORGOT to add them. Very clumsy of the manufacturer and sadly undermines a nice, very well priced product. Fortunately baby forgives them!
customer_reviews.author: MBee

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her play kitchen. The reason I went with this one over a pink one was because I wanted to make sure my newborn would be able to play with it as well when he is older. The only issue I have with it is the plates are hard for my daughter to put in and pull out of the slots, its tight and you really have to pull hard to get them out. Other than that it is a great kid friendly kitchen. She especially loves the noise the dial makes on the stove top and she likes twisting the dial for the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Missing most parts!
customer_reviews.text: Many parts were missing when I received this. It was missing the faucet, towel rack, phone, stove griddle, all stickers and all utensils! Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: boymama023

customer_reviews.title: Not a 4 star product
customer_reviews.text: Cheap product. Difficult to assemble. I can't put all the feet on the bottom as they don't fit in the holes. The oven door and cupboard door don't stay closed. I can't believe this toy had a 4 star rating. It didn't even come with a towel for the towel bar. I expect better from little tikes brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula Stephens

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS AND HOLES FOR ASSEMBLY NOT DRILLED
customer_reviews.text: I do not have time for a return as I purchased this for my Great Granddaughter and she will be here in two days. I am very disappointed in the quality of this product and the directions are a nightmare! If I can get a partial refund since pieces are missing and we have to assemble it as best we can from a YOUTUBE video since the instructions are USELESS!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINE HALL

customer_reviews.title: Cute Kitchen for Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kitchen for my 2 year old. Great for price and not too difficult to put up. Pretty sturdy would recommend
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Not the best kitchen I have seen
customer_reviews.text: Not the best kitchen I have seen. It is really tiny. The bottom is not very stable and it could easily tip over, especially on carpet. The cooking pan and plates are really cheap. The oven and cabinets are really shallow. No more than one item could fit inside at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Tina D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old daughter loves this little kitchen! We did not put the feet on the bottom due to her being a climber and wanted the extra stability incase she decided to climb it.
customer_reviews.author: K Moore

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: It fits into the corner of the bedroom saving precious space. It was a little hard to assemble but not horrible. The sounds are great!! My grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then it looks in the pic. But other than that it’s perfect. Ordered for a gift. They loved it. Makes boiling water sounds. Perfect for those little cooks
customer_reviews.author: christie

product_meta.title: Little Tikes Super Chef Kitchen
product_meta.description:
Durable Product

BRAND STORY
By

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Modern styled kitchen with lots of electronic cooking sounds and accessories, compact, stylish, modern kitchen makes a great addition to any play area. Cabinet door opens, with storage inside. Working microwave and oven doors. Clicker knob above oven door. Burner has electronic cooking sounds. Chrome look towel rail. Refrigerator door opens, room inside to store food. Feet under base add height.

See more
feature_bullets: Compact, stylish, modern kitchen makes a great addition to any play area
Cabinet door opens, with storage inside, working microwave and oven doors
Clicker knob above oven door. Burner has electronic cooking sounds. Chrome look towel rail
Refrigerator door opens, room inside to store food. Feet under base add height.
Includes: 1 Coffee Pot, 2 Plates, 2 Cups, 2 Forks, 2 Knives, 2 Spoons, 1 Frying Pan and 1 Phone; Made in USA

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,752 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
